original_text: Also, people outside the church should agree that the leader is a good person. Then nobody can say anything bad against him. And so, he will not come under the Devil's power.
korean_text: 또한 외인에게서도 선한 증거를 얻은 자라야 할지니 비방과 마귀의 올무에 빠질까 염려하라

sentences.original_text: should agree that the leader is a good person
Then nobody can say anything bad against him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 누구도 그에 대해 나쁜 말을 할 수 없다

sentences.original_text: And so, he will not come under the Devil's power
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그는 악마의 권세에 빠지지 않을 것이다
